title: Turtle Graphics Basics
description: Learn to draw with turtle graphics - create shapes and patterns using code

content.introduction:
Turtle Graphics is a fun way to learn programming by drawing! Imagine a turtle with a pen that can move around the screen, leaving a trail.

You control the turtle with simple commands like moving forward, turning, and lifting the pen up or down.

### What You'll Learn
- Basic turtle movement commands
- Drawing simple shapes
- Controlling the pen
- Using colors

concepts.title: Movement
concepts.description: Use Forward() and Backward() to move the turtle, TurnLeft() and TurnRight() to change direction

concepts.title: Pen Control
concepts.description: PenUp() lifts the pen (no drawing), PenDown() puts it down (drawing resumes)

concepts.title: Turtle Position
concepts.description: The turtle starts at the center (0, 0) facing north (up). Angles are in degrees.

examples.title: Simple Line
examples.description: Draw a simple line by moving the turtle forward

examples.title: Square
examples.description: Draw a square using a loop and turning 90 degrees

examples.title: Triangle
examples.description: Draw a triangle by turning 120 degrees

exercises.title: Draw a Rectangle
exercises.description: Draw a rectangle with width 150 and height 80. Remember: a rectangle has two long sides and two short sides!
hints: A rectangle has 4 sides: 2 long and 2 short
Use a loop that runs 2 times
In each loop, draw one long side and one short side

exercises.title: Pentagon
exercises.description: Draw a regular pentagon (5-sided shape). Hint: Each turn should be 360/5 = 72 degrees.
hints: Try a side length around 80 pixels

content.summary:
Excellent! You've learned:

- Basic turtle movement with `Forward()` and `Backward()`
- Turning with `TurnLeft()` and `TurnRight()`
- Setting pen properties with `SetPenColor()` and `SetPenWidth()`
- Drawing shapes using loops
- The relationship between angles and shapes

Turtle graphics makes programming visual and fun!
content.nextSteps: Next, you'll learn about **advanced turtle commands** like circles, arcs, and creating more complex patterns and designs.
